summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3676 , for the improvement of the alley between block 13, University Addition and block 2, Boetzki's University Addition, being the alley between 7th Avenue Northeast and 8th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45315 , and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
